content: मंत्रिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंत्रयते मंत्र् णिनि] {@--1@} Wise, clever in counsel. {@--2@} Familiar with sacred texts or spells. {@--3@} Ved Eloquent. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A minister, coun- sellor, a king's minister; <ls>R. 8. 17.</ls> <ls>Ms. 8. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A conjurer, an enchanter.
